4310920.name: Turscar Isle
4310920.description:
Sneak into an island held by a cult of spammers and rob them of everything they haven't nailed down! Yes, a cult of spammers. Could there be any group of antagonists that better deserve being robbed blind?

Maybe. But few are more pathetic.

Features

  • Bots that hear you around corners and through holes, see you in light, and never relax once they know something's up.

  • Open-ended extraction goal: you decide when to leave.

  • Tense, ominous atmosphere. Anyone who's played Thief might feel at home.

  • Notes to read. Some may even contain keycodes that some idiot wrote down!

  • Different difficulty levels, affecting detection speed and the number of allowed alerts.

  • Throwable distractions and items.

  • Different equipment types, unlocked by stealing loot from the cultists.

  • Guilt-free theft. You know you want to.
4310920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
